items.name: Samsing Galaxy Staff
items.customDescription: +115 Maximum Spell Dmg for all Surges. Reduce the cost of Electrical Spells by 7 when equipped as a Weapon. (Cannot go below 1)

items.name: Eye Phone
items.customDescription:
I think this is different.
Reduces the Electrical Rune and Light Rune cost of spells by 2

attacks.name: Digital Barrage
attacks.description: An avoidable attack that deals damage up to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, gives the enemy +${onHitEffect0modValue0}% Attack Interval for ${onHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turns.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: An <avoidable> attack that deals damage up to <damage> <count> times over <duration>. On a hit, <hitEffect>.

attacks.name: Can You Hear Me Now?
attacks.description: ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage on the 1st attack, ${attackDamageMaxValue1}% of your normal damage on the 2nd attack, and ${attackDamageMaxValue2}% of your normal damage on the 3rd attack inflicts Burn that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's current hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s

attacks.name: Planned Non-Obsolescence
attacks.description: Three attacks ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your Magic level + 1.

attacks.name: Shooting Star
attacks.description: Converts your selected Standard Magic Spell into 4 shooting stars, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, gives the enemy +${onHitEffect0modValue0}% Attack Interval for ${onHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turns. Consumes Runes per hit.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Converts your selected Standard Magic Spell into a Magic Ray, dealing <damage> <count> times over <duration>. On a hit, <hitEffect>. Consumes Runes per hit.

attacks.name: Recover Data
attacks.description: Perform a regular attack (Avoidable). Gives Regen that heals ${preHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of your max hitpoints over ${preHitEffect0duration}s.

attacks.name: Enlightenment
attacks.description: Gives the enemy immunity to their own attack type for ${preHitEffect0turns} of their turns and gives them Regen that heals ${preHitEffect1DamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's max hitpoints over ${preHitEffect1duration}s. If the evasion buff is already active perform a regular attack instead.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: On use, <prehitEffect>. If evasion buff is already active perform a regular attack instead.

pets.name: Njostr
pets.customDescription: Oh no! What happened to his leg?

pets.name: USSSSSSSSSSSB
pets.customDescription: ssssssay, you wouldn't happen to have a charger on you, would ya'?

pets.name: Andy
pets.customDescription: ABCDEFG, say 'Hello' to your new robot, Andy!
